GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetHabitat.description: List of years for which landcover should be extracted (maximum range 1992 - 2020).
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetHabitat.label: Years of interest

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetHabitat.description: List of landcover class identifiers to be extract (for identifiers see https://savs.eumetsat.int/html/images/landcover_legend.png)
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetHabitat.label: Landcover classes

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.description: Estimated Ne:Nc ratio for the studied species. Multiple values can be provided, separated by a comma.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.label: Ne:Nc ratio estimate

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.description: Set a name for the pipeline run.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.label: Title of the run
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.example: Quercus sartorii, Mexico, Habitat decline by tree cover loss, 2000-2023

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.description: Estimated density of the population [number of individuals per km2]. Multiple values can be provided, separated by a comma.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.label: Population density

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.description: Scientific name of the species, used to look for occurrences in GBIF.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.label: Species names

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.description: Vector of float, bbox coordinates of the bbox in the order xmin, ymin, xmax, ymax
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.label: Bounding box

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.description: Radius size [in km] to determine population presence around the coordinates of species observations.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.label: Size of buffer

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.description: Distance [in km] to separate species observations in different populations.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.label: Distance between populations

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.description: Integer, 4 digit year, end date to retrieve occurrences
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.label: End year

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.description: Integer, 4 digit year, start date to retrieve occurrences
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetPopulat.label: Start year

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.description: Estimated proportion of mantained populations, comparing earliest and latest time point. A value of 1 means that no populations went extinct over the time frame.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.label: Population maintained indicator

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.description: Estimated proportion of populations with Ne>500 at latest time point.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.label: Ne>500 indicator

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.description: Estimated effective size of every population, based on the latest time point of the habitat cover map.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.label: Effective population size

GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.description: An interactive interface to explore indicators trends across geographical space and time.
GenesFromSpace>ToolComponents>GetIndicat.label: Interactive plot

metadata.name: Land cover loss by populations from GBIF occurrences (bbox)
metadata.description: Genes from Space tool. The tool retrieves species occurrence from GBIF, then used to define polygons of population distribution based on geographic proximity.  The tool then draws a habitat suitability map over time, based on the presence of land cover classes of interest.  Finally, the tool estimates the size of suitable habitat over time for every population, and computes indicators of genetic diversity monitoring accordingly (Ne500 and Populations Maintained indicators). Population maps and genetic diversity indicators are displayed through an interactive interface.

references.text: ESA. Land Cover CCI Product User Guide Version 2. Tech. Rep. (2017)
